=`AVG`=

{{{
AVG(numeric_expression) 
}}}

===Remarks===

Returns the average of the values in a group.

===Examples===

{{{
SELECT deptID, AVG(year) FROM Employees GROUP BY deptID;
}}}

{{{
SELECT blue, AVG(red) FROM colors GROUP BY blue;
}}}
